TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Mouse extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用於取得本機電腦上安裝之滑鼠格式和組態資訊的屬性。

span.span: Provides properties for getting information about the format and configuration of the mouse installed on the local computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Mouse`物件可用來尋找電腦的滑鼠相關資訊： 是否已交換滑鼠按鈕，以及滑鼠滾輪詳細資料。The `My.Computer.Mouse` object provides a way to find information about the computer's mouse: whether the mouse buttons are swapped, and details about the mouse wheel. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Mouse.WheelExists`和`My.Computer.Mouse.WheelScrollLines`屬性來判斷滑鼠有滾輪來捲動多少它旋轉時。This example uses the `My.Computer.Mouse.WheelExists` and `My.Computer.Mouse.WheelScrollLines` properties to determine if the mouse has a scroll wheel and how much to scroll when it rotates. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#26)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Mouse`物件可用來尋找電腦的滑鼠相關資訊： 滑鼠按鈕是否會交換，以及滑鼠滾輪詳細資料。The `My.Computer.Mouse` object provides a way to find information about the computer's mouse: whether the mouse buttons are swapped and details about the mouse wheel.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ButtonsSwapped As Boolean
public: property bool ButtonsSwapped { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 ，指出滑鼠左鍵和右鍵的功能是否已調換。

span.span: Gets a that indicates if the functionality of the left and right mouse buttons has been swapped.

value.span: 如果滑鼠左鍵和右鍵的功能已調換，則 值為 ，否則為 。

span.span: A with a value if the functionality of the left and right mouse buttons has been swapped; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Mouse.ButtonsSwapped`屬性：The `My.Computer.Mouse.ButtonsSwapped` property: - 提供類似的功能屬性。Provides functionality similar to the property. - 提供執行的程式碼的電腦的相關資訊。Provides information about the computer that runs the code. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Mouse.ButtonsSwapped`屬性來判斷是否已調換滑鼠左右按鈕的功能。This example uses the `My.Computer.Mouse.ButtonsSwapped` property to determine if functionality of the left and right mouse buttons has been swapped. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#35](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#35)]

span.span: The computer has no mouse installed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WheelExists As Boolean
public: property bool WheelExists { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 ，指出滑鼠是否具有滾輪。

span.span: Gets a that indicates if the mouse has a scroll wheel.

value.span: 如果滑鼠具有滾輪，則 Boolean 值為 ，否則為 。

span.span: A Boolean with value if the mouse has a scroll wheel; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Computer.Mouse.WheelExists`屬性會提供類似的功能屬性。The `My.Computer.Mouse.WheelExists` property provides functionality similar to the property. 您應該檢查的值`My.Computer.Mouse.WheelExists`屬性之後再嘗試存取屬性，就會擲回例外狀況，如果滑鼠滾輪。You should check the value of the `My.Computer.Mouse.WheelExists` property before attempting to access the property, which throws an exception if the mouse does not have a scroll wheel. `My.Computer.Mouse.WheelExists`屬性會提供執行的程式碼之電腦的相關資訊。The `My.Computer.Mouse.WheelExists` property provides information about the computer that runs the code. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`My.Computer.Mouse.WheelExists`屬性來判斷滑鼠有滾輪來捲動多少轉動滑鼠滾輪時。This example uses the `My.Computer.Mouse.WheelExists` property to determine if the mouse has a scroll wheel and how much to scroll when the mouse wheel is rotated. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#26)]

span.span: The computer has no mouse installed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WheelScrollLines As Integer
public: property int WheelScrollLines { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出當滑鼠滾輪滾動一格時捲動的大小。

span.span: Gets a number that indicates how much to scroll when the mouse wheel is rotated one notch.

value.span: ，指出當滑鼠滾輪滾動一格時捲動的大小。

span.span: An that indicates how much to scroll when the mouse wheel is rotated one notch.

value.span: 正值表示按行數捲動，負值表示一次捲動一個螢幕。

span.span: A positive value indicates scrolling by that number of lines, while a negative value indicates scrolling by one screen at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷多少行向上或向下捲動有捲軸的多行控制項。You can use this property to determine how many lines to scroll up or down in a multi-line control that has a scroll bar. `My.Computer.Mouse.WheelScrollLines`屬性會提供類似的功能屬性。The `My.Computer.Mouse.WheelScrollLines` property provides functionality similar to the property. 因為如果滑鼠滾輪，則這個屬性會擲回例外狀況，您應該確定滑鼠有滾輪，藉由檢查`My.Computer.Mouse.WheelExists`屬性。Because this property throws an exception if the mouse does not have a scroll wheel, you should make sure a mouse has a scroll wheel by checking the `My.Computer.Mouse.WheelExists` property. 這個屬性會提供執行的程式碼的電腦的相關資訊。This property provides information about the computer that runs the code. ## 專案類型的可用性Availability by Project Type |專案類型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 應用程式Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |類別庫Class Library|**是****Yes**| |主控台應用程式Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控制項程式庫Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控制項程式庫Web Control Library|否No| |Windows 服務Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |網站Web Site|否No| ## Examples 如果滑鼠有滾輪，而且會使用此範例會判斷`My.Computer.Mouse.WheelExists`屬性來判斷多少轉動滑鼠滾輪時要捲動。This example determines if the mouse has a scroll wheel and uses the `My.Computer.Mouse.WheelExists` property to determine how much to scroll when the mouse wheel is rotated. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyComputer#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyComputer/VB/Class2.vb#26)]

span.span: The mouse has no scroll wheel.
